data.eml:eml: A new wolf spider species in the genus Alopecosa Simon, 1885 (Araneae: Lycosidae) from Eastern Europe

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nadolny, Anton A., Ponomarev, Alexandr V., Dvadnenko, Konstantin V. (2012): A new wolf spider species in the genus Alopecosa Simon, 1885 (Araneae: Lycosidae) from Eastern Europe. Zootaxa 3484: 83-88, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214889
